All.UsageTerms: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey  (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data for other purposes, nor on all computer  systems, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty
All.Contributor: Athina M.Z. Lange, Jin-Si R. Over, Christopher R. Sherwood

bright.Caption: The brightest image taken at CACO-03 c1 at Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts, USA on [insert_creation_datetime]
bright.Comment: Brightest image for [insert_creation_datetime]; This image was captured from a stationary camera (CACO-03 c1) at Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts. Field Activity Number: 2024-002-FA, 2025-006-FA
bright.Caption-Abstract: The brightest image represents the maximum intensity of each pixel during the 10 minute video.  This image was captured from a stationary camera (CACO-03 c1) at Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts, Field Activity Number: 2024-002-FA and 2025-006-FA on [insert_creation_datetime]. For more info, see https://www.usgs.gov/centers/whcmsc/science/using-video-imagery-study-marconi-beach.
bright.Keywords: Marconi Beach, Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts, CoastCam, USGS, bright, remote sensing
bright.Description: https://cmgds.marine.usgs.gov/services/activity.php?fan=2024-002-FA; https://cmgds.marine.usgs.gov/services/activity.php?fan=2025-006-FA; This image was captured from a stationary camera (CACO-03 c1) at Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts. Field Activity Number: 2024-002-FA and 2025-006-FA.

timex.Caption-Abstract: The time exposure image represents the time-averaged image of all frames during the 10 minute video. var.Caption-Abstract: The variance image represents the standard deviation of pixel intensity for each pixel during the 10 minute video.  This image was captured from a stationary camera (CACO-03 c1) at Cape Cod National Seashore, Massachusetts, Field Activity Number: 2024-002-FA and 2025-006-FA on [insert_creation_datetime]. For more info, see https://www.usgs.gov/centers/whcmsc/science/using-video-imagery-study-marconi-beach.
